title: Ep. 165 S&A Investor - Why America Will Never Be Energy Independent
itunes:title: Why America Will Never Be Energy Independent
description: Arthur Berman, geology and energy expert for over 30 years, says there is no way U.S. becomes energy independent anytime soon. He also discusses why weather - not new technologies like fracking - is mostly to blame for record high natural gas storage.
content:encoded: Arthur Berman, geology and energy expert for over 30 years, says there is no way U.S. becomes energy independent anytime soon. He also discusses why weather - not new technologies like fracking - is mostly to blame for record high natural gas storage.
